Name: Formula X
About the game: 3D racing game with battle elements, top-down camera style similar to genesis (mega drive) titles and super nintendo, lots of speed action in a frantic race! five cars, each car has a different item to use during races. Arcade mode: has 16 races. Pro mode: has 4 races. Free Mode: allows you to run on previously released tracks. control: support for: keyboard, Full controller support.
